title: Microsoft Outlook's Exchange Online mailbox issues will be fixed… eventually
description: Microsoft are working on a fix that's breaking organizational email, but IT admins can implement a fix manually.

title: Google Family Link gets location tracking plus better screen time limiting features
description: Google refreshes its parental control app and also updates Google TV to be more kid-friendly.

title: Bird downsizing pulls e-scooters from select European countries and US cities
description: Bird is downsizing again, with the blame getting placed on economic downturns and poor support from local governments.

title: The next version of Firefox is solving one of the most annoying PDF problems
description: Firefox 106 has brought some improved PDF handling features, more customization, and quicker access to private mode.

title: The world’s largest Raspberry Pi cluster has a rather surprising supporter
description: If you’re looking for unmatched Raspberry Pi power, come talk to Oracle.

title: Google Chrome for Android is getting a huge update for tablets
description: Google Chrome wants to make browsing better for professionals using Android tablets.

title: NAD's limited-edition amp is the 70s hi-fi fetish object I've always wanted
description: NAD's limited-edition integrated amplifier is the latest entry in a growing lineup of vintage-inspired audio gear.

title: Reckless malware operators squandered an "undetectable" Windows backdoor
description: A major oversight by a threat actor ought to make Windows a lot safer going forward.

title: IONOS and Fasthosts to migrate Gloucester data center to £21m Worcester facility
description: IONOS and Fasthosts promise improved efficiency of shared hosting services with new Worcester data center hub.

title: Apple raised iPad Mini prices while our heads were turned and it sucks
description: Apple released new iPads and raised the price of last year's models on the same day, strangely.

title: Black Friday starts November 7 at Walmart - here's all you need to know
description: Walmart has announced its plans for this year's Black Friday, including four deals events throughout November.

title: Logitech’s official iPad accessories are just like Apple's but a lot cheaper
description: Logitech's iPad accessories are just as good as Apple's official ones, but they come at a much lower price.

title: The DualSense Edge is demonstrably overpriced even by premium standards
description: The DualSense Edge's price has been revealed, and it's only worsening Pro controllers' expensive reputation.

title: Deadbolt ransomware is being used to target NAS vendors and customers
description: Whatever your interest in network-attached storage, one ransomware attack group may be coming for you.

title: B&W's James Bond 007 Edition wireless headphones are a view to (a) kill for
description: Bowers & Wilkins' gorgeous PX8 wireless over-ears are being given a limited edition release, echoing the midnight blue tuxedo worn by James Bond in Dr. No – 60 years ago.

title: Black Panther 2's cast have a 'different idea' about who should be the new Black Panther
description: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever's characters all have an opinion on who should assume the mantle after T'Challa.

title: AMD RDNA 3 flagship GPU could have Nvidia RTX 4090 on the ropes
description: Fresh AMD RDNA 3 graphics card rumors could have Nvidia worried on the power front – and more besides.

title: Verizon notifies prepaid customers of account breaches
description: A threat actor was reported to have accessed Verizon accounts in early October, and affected customers have been notified.

title: Is this the most secure hard drive platform around today?
description: ClevX is introducing a new self-encrypting platform, available for internal and external SSDs and HDDs.

title: DaVinci Resolve’s free video editor set for iPad release
description: DaVinci Resolve is heading to the new Apple iPad Pro.

title: Password usage is falling worldwide - but that might not be a big problem
description: Passwords are losing ground to a number of state-of-the-art authentication methods that don't rely on them, according to experts.

title: Full password protection for half price with this NordPass Black Friday deal
description: For its Black Friday and Cyber Monday deals, Nord has just dropped NordPass prices on all its available plans.

title: Taskbar updates and File Explorer tabs finally arrive in Windows 11
description: After a major update in September, refinements to Taskbar and File Explorer arrive in a smaller update this week.

title: Marvel's Ironheart show might introduce a long overdue villain
description: The MCU may see a villain, first teased in WandaVision, make their live-action debut in Ironheart.

title: Intel Arc A770 somehow beats the Nvidia RTX 4090 in 8K video playback tests
description: It’s a little embarrassing for Nvidia to see its mighty new flagship GPU beaten by Intel’s far cheaper alternative.

title: Forget Windows 11 and macOS – you can install Windows 95 on a MacBook
description: New version of Windows 95 for macOS and Linux proves science has gone too far.

title: Apple is pausing iPhone 14 Plus production already, but don't panic – yet
description: Apple is reportedly pausing iPhone 14 Plus production, but you should still be able to buy one for the time being.

title: Are air fryers worth it?
description: We find out if now is the time to invest in one of the latest air fryers and if they do, indeed, save time, money and effort.

title: Nvidia RTX 4090 Ti GPU might be inbound, but forget about that RTX Titan
description: Titan of Lovelace is no more, if this top-end GPU ever was planned – but an RTX 4090 Ti, on the other hand…

title: iPadOS 16.1, iOS 16.1 and macOS Ventura finally arrive next week
description: Alongside new iPads and a new Apple TV, a bunch of software updates will be available after months of testing and feedback.

title: Motorola Razr 3’s matching cheap earbuds say ‘Hello Moto’ like it’s 2004
description: Budget earbuds that say ‘Hello Moto’ every time you fire them up are surely the perfect addition to the upcoming 2022 retro Razr phone…

title: Netflix's subscriber growth can't mask all of its problems
description: Netflix posted its biggest subscriber gains in almost two years – but HBO Max and Disney Plus are still gunning hard for its crown.

title: Netflix is back from the brink – and it has Stranger Things to thank
description: Netflix has seemingly reversed its subscriber losses by adding 2.4 million subscribers between July and September 2022.

title: Google Pixel Buds Pro get a great free audio upgrade that shows up AirPods Pro 2
description: Google just added five-band EQ to the Pixel Buds Pro, meaning you can now tune the sound.

title: The foldable iPhone could be incredibly expensive – and land after a foldable iPad
description: Apple's first foldable could land in 2024, but it might not be a phone.

title: Adobe's updates to Photoshop on the iPad lays down a promising future
description: Adobe's MAX event revealed Photoshop on iPad finally lets you remove the background for images, and much more.

title: DuckDuckGo browser for Mac beta has one trick YouTube won't like - but you will
description: DuckDuckGo for Mac keeps web privacy as its core value while also having a renewed focus on blocking YouTube ads
